Post

    • Uses of Post in <Unnamed>

      Methods in <Unnamed> that return Post 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Post User.addPost(java.lang.String subreddit, PostType type, java.lang.String title)
      Instantiate a new post with the appropriate parameters and add it to the list of posts posted by the user.
      Methods in <Unnamed> that return types with arguments of type Post 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Post> User.getDisliked()
      Returns a copy of the list of posts disliked by the user the list itself should not be exposed.
      java.util.List<Post> RedditDB.getFrontpage(User user)
      Get all the posts to be displayed on the front page of a particular user and return them.
      java.util.List<Post> RedditDB.getFrontpage(User user, java.lang.String subreddit)
      Get all the posts from the specified subreddit to be displayed on the front page of a particular user and return them.
      java.util.List<Post> User.getLiked()
      Returns a copy of the list of posts liked by the user; the list itself should not be exposed.
      java.util.List<Post> User.getPosted()
      Returns a copy of the list of posts posted by the user; the list itself should not be exposed.
      Methods in <Unnamed> with parameters of type Post 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void User.dislike(Post post)
      Downvote the post and add it to the List of disliked posts if not already disliked; else undo the dislike.
      void User.like(Post post)
      Upvote the post and add it to the List of liked posts if not already liked; else undo the like.If the post is currently disliked by the user, the dislike should be undone.
      void User.undoDislike(Post post)
      Remove the post from the list of disliked posts and update its karma appropriately.
      void User.undoLike(Post post)
      Remove the post from the list of disliked posts and update its karma appropriately.
